title: I need to know if i can sue the water company for being neglagent on not send out bills. And charging you extra to get it back
question: For the last past four to six months we been getting no bills for this water company. Then they charge me more money to get it turned back on. We been back and forth with them telling them they are not send it to are land lord or the house. They keep saying its out of our hands.
answers: No. You can't sue. You knew there's a cost for water. You can call the Public Utilities Commision.

Go to www.naca.net and look for a consumer attorney near you. Good luck!
the Cal Utilities Commission public advocate may also be of help.
Good luck!
I agree. This is not a personal injury issues, but a debt collection/contract issue. You should consult with an attorney to determine if the utility company has done anything wrong.
I don't see this is a personal injury issue but you should contact an attorney who specializes in debt collection issues.
